question: If <katex>$f(x) = \sin[\pi^2]x - \sin[-\pi^2]x$</katex>, where <katex>$[x]$</katex> = greatest integer <katex>$\le x$</katex>, then which of the following is not true?
explanation: Checking option (4): <katex>$f(\pi) = \sin(9\pi) + \sin(10\pi) = 0 + 0 = 0$</katex>. The option says -1, which is not true.
